ApexPage.description:
This page is going to override the standard detail page for the account. It will contain another 2 pages 1. EnhancedTransactionListView (Tab for related transactions) 2. NotesView (Tab for related notes)
The page has the functionality to remember the last tab visited by the user. (To save user preferences there is a separate object User_Preferences__c)
ApexPage.label: Account Detail Page
